name: datacom-design-tokens
description: ### Getting Started ðŸš€ This contains the all the style tokens for the Datacom brand. The tokens can be built for 3 different platforms at the moment - web, android and ios. The tokens are stored as JSON files under `src/`. The brand colors are under `src/color` and applies to all platforms. However things like fonts and typography can be specific to platforms and for web these can be found in `src/web-platform`. To create new tokens specific to ios or android please create `src/ios-platform` or `src/android-platform`.
author: Datacom <datacom.tokens@gmail.com> (datacom.com)
